references.paper_title: Qwen2-vl: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: This paper is considered important as it introduces Qwen2-VL, the model upon which DeepPerception is built.

references.paper_title: Improved baselines with visual instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper is important because it presents improved baselines using visual instruction tuning, which is a relevant technique in the context of DeepPerception.

references.paper_title: Novel dataset for fine-grained image categorization
references.reason: This paper is considered important since it presents a novel dataset for fine-grained image categorization, which is used to train the model.

references.paper_title: Referitgame: Referring to objects in photographs of natural scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces the ReferitGame dataset and task, which is related to visual grounding and referring expression comprehension, fundamental tasks tackled by DeepPerception.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in Ilms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is important because the DeepPerception training framework draws inspiration from it.
